title: Phil Mugford
subtitle: An unlikely hero of the Spanish Civil War this chap, whose bust graces Alicante harbour, captained the boat that led over 2,000 refugees to the relative safety of Oran, Algeria. Braving the Nazi u-boats, on arrival in Oran he threatened to ram the harbour if not allowed to dock. pic.twitter.com/2X6VA1XcQi

title: Reset
subtitle:
NOTICE FOR COMMUNITY SPONSORSHIP GROUPS: 

There'll be fireworks this week for NYE. Some of the refugees you're working with may find fireworks distressing. If you know there'll be fireworks near them, let them know. 

Knowing when & where the fireworks will be can help a lot. pic.twitter.com/QFqOAyBqRI
